Articles.Content:
This is a game where we ask which famous fictional character would win in a fight. Here are the rules of the fight:

1.The fight takes place in an enclosed space about the size of a baseball field. The room has folding chairs and a large folding table, but nothing else.

2.This is a fight to the death. Two icons enter, one icon leaves.

3.Allies are not allowed to help. Things like demon summoning, however, are allowed.

4.All powers and weapons are allowed. Keep in mind, though, tools are only as good as their wielder, and sometimes restrictions apply to them.

5.Don't use Chuck Norris. We all know Chuck Norris always wins.

6.Please try to be unbiased. Yes, you like Goku more than Superman, but who would win in a fight?

Here's how it works: First someone posts a match up of two famous fictional characters. Then, the next person says who would win and gives reasons. Then, they post the next match up, and the cycle continues. I'll start.

Here's a classic: Batman Vs. Superman. Remember the unbiased rule, please!

Batman, he carries a single shot pistol with a kryptonite bullet on his person at all times, and has won what amounted to a quick-draw contest with a deity.

Next up: Deadpool Vs. Boba Fett

Edited July 31, 2013 by Mecha Pants

Boba Fett, Deadpool can't fly.

The Doctor (from Doctor Who) vs. Doc Brown (from Back To The Future)

Doctor Who, he destroyed his Delorian with his Sonic Screwdriver

Han Solo V.S Indiana Jones

Han Solo, he has better technology on him.

Darth Vader Vs. Superman.

Edited August 1, 2013 by The Jedi Master
ninja'd

Darth Vader because its hard to kill him when the force is strong with him.

Next up: Captain Kurk vs. Captain Picard

Picard could easily knock Kirk out in a fight.

Han Solo Vs. Batman

Batman, he's better at stealth than Solo

I got nothing... crap.

Well, think of something! Getting this going again...

A battle of good and bad comedy: Patrick Star Vs. Jar Jar Binks.

Patrick would win by beating Jar-Jar with a rock thinking hes a spider.

Captain Marvel vs Iron Man

Iron Man out of pure luck.

Minecraft Steve or Jeb Kermin (so it begins)

Jeb, why? Well, he has limbs, and a moving mouth. And can be possibly real in the universe

The Soviet Space Program VS the US Space Program

The soviet space program, they were first into space.

The incredible hulk or Iron man?

Hulk. He held together a whole planet once.

Hal 9000 or Gerty 3000?

Draw, they would have no way to fight each other in the battle room.

Inuyasha Vs. Naruto. (if you don't know Inuyasha, look him up.)

Naruto because (just like Iron Man) it was out of pure luck.

A Spartan III vs a Spartan IV

Spartan IV because it is upgraded further

Stephen Hawking Vs. Sheldon Cooper.

Stephen Hawking, could you hit him?

Han Solo Vs. Gimili (Neither have weapons)

Gimili because (using Samaria fighting logic (for no good reason what so ever)) Han always shoots first and those you hit first loses.

S.H.E.I.L.D. or Justice League (view them as if one person)

Justice league. No questions asked.

Superman vs Jebediah Kerman.

Note:NSFW

Take note:

Edited August 8, 2013 by Pugspaceprogram

Jeb wins because SRBs are almighty. That and Kerbals break the universe better than Superman.

Kerbals VS The whole Soviet army during WW2.

Draw. Both sides lost too many people. (Several thousand (to million possibly?) rockets crashed, several millon Kerbals dead; several thousand (to million possibly?) Soviet army vehicles destroyed, possibly 10 million Soviets dead.)

US Space Program vs Time.

US Space Program because no matter how long time will go on there will always be a peice of the US space program somewhere.

Ditto vs. Zoroark (sh*t getting real)

Tie? Ditto turns in to a zoroark and they both fant(i have no pokemon knolge btw)

S117 v freeman(both with full loadouts)

Outcome uncertain: Between both KIA and both OOA (out of ammo).

SimCity 4 vs. SimCity 5
